author: sky.cactus
content: <@399256149406515200>The PDF has some stuff cut out between pages.

author: sky.cactus
content: Page 4, one block per 15 seconds, not 15 minutes.

author: sky.cactus
content: In the future I recommend doing drafts in Google Docs or Medium as they are both much easier to comment on.  There are minor typos and grammar issues that I'm skipping because explaining where they are in a PDF is too hard.

author: sky.cactus
content: The reason we don't issue more blocks isn't because it is complicated (which is what you say).  It is actually very easy to change the block rate.  The issue is that more blocks results in trains running in to each other, and everyone having to pay for wasted train fuel when one of the two trains that crash gets kicked off the tracks and it's passengers all have to switch trains.
